name: Plushie Bomber
description:
Blow your enemies up with their own bombs in this explosive 2D action platformer! Catch the deadly plushies' bombs in time to throw them right back to the sender! Will you uncover the cute fluffy toys' origins?

Catch the bombs before they hit you!

You have no weapons on your own, so you’ll need to do with whatever your enemies throw at you. And by whatever we mean bombs.

Throw bombs at enemies !

Once you have bomb, you can throw it in all directions.

Explore the archipelago and find out about the origin of the plushies

Everything changed when a Plushie destroyed our beloved protagonist’s TV… Unforgivable.

Dodge obstacles in classic platformer fashion!

Classic hand crafted levels with a different mechanic in every single one of them.

Try to find all the secret carrots scattered in every level!

We love secrets! So we decided to hide multiple secret carrots in each level for those of you who love to find hidden fruits and vegetables.
